title: How do I use a Huawei headset to control music playback?
answer:
Press the headset button to play or pause music in the music player. 

 Press the headset button twice to skip to the next song. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123277)

 Please use an original Huawei headset. Headsets made by other brands may be incompatible with Huawei phones, meaning that they cannot be used to control music playback. Non-Huawei music players may not support headset playback control. Please contact the app developer for details.
keywords: headset; listen to music; pause; skip; next song
